titles.title: FIRST State and Local Law Enforcement Act of 2023
Federal Information Resource to Strengthen Ties with State and Local Law Enforcement Act of 2023
FIRST State and Local Law Enforcement Act of 2023
To amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to require an annual report on the Office for State and Local Law Enforcement.

bill.summary:
Federal Information Resource to Strengthen Ties with State and Local Law Enforcement Act of 2023 or the FIRST State and Local Law Enforcement Act of 2023
This bill requires the Department of Homeland Security's Office for State and Local Law Enforcement to report annually on its activities.
